data.name: Declaration.Paragraph1
data.value: By confirming your details, you agree that the information you’ve given is complete and correct.

data.name: Declaration.Paragraph2
data.value: You also agree that you would like the regulator to approve an account for your organisation.

data.name: Declaration.Paragraph1.ApprovedUser
data.value: By confirming your details, you agree that the information you’ve given is complete and correct, and that you:

data.name: Declaration.Paragraph2.ApprovedUser
data.value: are able to submit data to the environmental regulator for

data.name: Declaration.Paragraph4.ApprovedUser
data.value: have access to the information you need to submit data correctly

data.name: Declaration.Warning
data.value: You can be fined or prosecuted if you give the wrong information.
